Allaire Debuts More Web Tools

21 Jul 1999

Allaire makes some fine products and coming soon (October 99) they will be releasing some more tools to round out their web publishing arsenal. Their newest addition to the family is called Spectra, and includes e-commerce software and strong personalization tools. Read the article on CNET for more info.
